channel.title: Adding Fishing for Dummies
channel.description:
Can anybody tell me how to add a simple fishing. All I want to do is make it so when you use a lobster cage on fishing spot, you get a lobster. Same with sharks. I know where I need to put the code I just can't figure out what it should be. If you can't help me could you point me in the direction of a good tut for 317?
Thanks. :)
